course_name: Foundations of Midwifery and Midwifery with Complex Pregnancy
description: This course enables students to change from the Bachelor of Nursing program to either the Bachelor of Midwifery or the Bachelor of Nursing/Bachelor of Midwifery following completion of year one in the Bachelor Nursing. This course provides the foundational midwifery knowledge covered in year one of the Bachelor of Midwifery and the Bachelor of Nursing/Bachelor of Midwifery through an intensive three day workshops including clinical skills simulation augmented by online modules prior to students' exposure to health complexities in pregnancy.
